Title: Establishes the water resiliency projects fund; appropriation
Summary: Establishes the water resiliency projects fund for flood mitigation, stormwater mitigation and other water related resiliency projects; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the water resiliency projects fund; and making an appropriation therefor
